ComicInfo.Series: Dark Souls: The Age of Fire
ComicInfo.Summary:
Direct tie-in to Dark Souls One, debuting on Nintendo Switch and being rereleased on PS4, Xbox One and PC in 2018! Return to the very beginning of the Dark Souls story with a dramatic retelling of the legends of Gwyn - Lord of Cinder and Knight Artorias!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Pablo Fernandez Angulo | 1 | B | Cover B | Anton Kokarev | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 12:37:41. [CVDB686959] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 07:16:34. [Issue ID 1855750]
ComicInfo.Title: The Age of Fire Issue 4
ComicInfo.Characters: Channeler Liste,Seath the Scaleless,Knight Artorias,Gywn,Executioner Wurdow,Dragon Knight Gravis,Silver Knight Arkon
